DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomize open-label pilot study investigate effect mycophenolate mofetil treatment patient abnormal urine protein excretion due membranous nephropathy ( MN ) focal segmental glomerulosclerosis ( FSGS ) . The change urine protein excretion primary outcome study . The treatment regimen comprise prednisolone mycophenolate mofetil compare prednisolone chlorambucil MN , compare prednisolone FSGS . The study duration 12 month patient .
